Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Harbour House Hotel in Hermanus, you'll be on the Strip and close to Whalehaven Winery and Hermanus Beach. This 5-star hotel is within the region of Bot River Estuary.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 47 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves and plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have separate bathtubs and showers and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Planning an event in Hermanus? This hotel has 50 square feet (5 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Whalehaven Winery - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Hermanus Beach - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Bot River Estuary - 15.2 km / 9.5 mi
Gansbaai Harbor - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi
Grootbos Nature Reserve - 20.8 km / 12.9 mi
Kleinmond Beach - 20.8 km / 12.9 mi
Danger Point Lighthouse - 23.8 km / 14.8 mi
Kleinbaai Harbour - 23.9 km / 14.9 mi
Kogelberg Biosphere Reserve - 24.2 km / 15.1 mi
Betty's Bay Penguin Colony - 32.6 km / 20.3 mi
Dyer Island - 33.2 km / 20.6 mi
Cape Agulhas - 83.6 km / 51.9 mi
Graham Beck Winery - 85.9 km / 53.4 mi
Roman Beach - 94.1 km / 58.5 mi
Montagu Museum - 107.1 km / 66.5 mi

The preferred airport for Harbour House Hotel is Cape Town (CPT-Cape Town Intl.) - 77.7 km / 48.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
